source.name: Climate Reference Network Data Visualizations
source.description: The U.S. Climate Reference Network is designed specifically to monitor national climate change with best scientific practice and adherence to the accepted principles of climate observations. The Climate Reference Network provides several visualizations of data collected from its stations, including novel visualizations of soil moisture and time series graphs of many CRN climate observations.
